item.title: SELECT Insights - Bundling with Microsoft Fabric and Orchestration (#2)
item.description: Hello friends, A quick note before we start: I changed the name of this newsletter to “SELECT Insights” and changed the structure slightly.

item.title: April Newsletter 2023
item.description: Hello friends! Welcome to the new format of my newsletter! I aim to create a more informal space for updates and discussions on Data Engineering and other topics I explore as I create new content.
